Message.Title: GOOG stock price - the day after earnings:
Message.Msg: There are 35 earning releases since GOOGâ€™s inception in 2004. There are 14 price down the day after earnings, and 21 price rise after earnings, therefore the odds are inn favor of Calls. The biggest price jump the day after earning was April 17, 2008; the day after GOOG jumped from 499.54 to 564.29, a 19.9 % up in price. The biggest slump was Jan 19, 2012; GOOG fell from 639.57 to 585.99, and that was a 8.37% fall.
